name: ApexSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill enables RTI customers to control their home automation devices through Alexa voice assistant.
The devices include LED lights, Thermostat, Blinds, AC, Home Theater equipment and other IOT devices which integrate only with RTI processors. 
Please note:
- You MUST have an RTI Processor and a corresponding driver installed and connected to the internet for this skill to work.
- While enabling the skill, you may get redirected to Amazon login page to link your existing Amazon account to the skill.
- Usually the field engineers take care of the skill enabling process and integrating RTI processor with Alexa.
